section.p: "An investigation or inspection for the purpose of diagnosis" (The American Heritage Stedman's Medical Dictionary)

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] date with data type Point In Time
The date and time of the examination for the patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] examType with data type Code
Contains the code that identifies the type of examination performed for the patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
Unique identifier for the is Examination occurrence.

Contains exactly one [1..1] isNormal with data type Boolean
Identifies the results of the exam suggested values: A=Abnormal, N=Normal, etc

Contains exactly one [1..1] results with data type String
The consequence of a particular action, operation, or course; an outcome.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
The status of the examination for the patient.
Contains zero or more [0..*] relatedExamination, where its type is Related Examination

Contains exactly one [1..1] clinicalServceId with data type Id
Unique Identifier for this Clinical service .

Contains exactly one [1..1] typeOfService with data type Code
Clinical Speciality ID

Contains exactly one [1..1] date with data type Point In Time
The date and time of the examination for the patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] examType with data type Code
Contains the code that identifies the type of examination performed for the patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
Unique identifier for the is Examination occurrence.

Contains exactly one [1..1] isNormal with data type Boolean
Identifies the results of the exam suggested values: A=Abnormal, N=Normal, etc

Contains exactly one [1..1] results with data type String
The consequence of a particular action, operation, or course; an outcome.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
The status of the examination for the patient.
Contains zero or one [0..1] clinicalProcedureRecord, where its type is Clinical Procedure Record
Contains zero or more [0..*] relatedExamination, where its type is Related Examination
